thread.title: Hayatou kidney issue won't affect FIFA presidential job, says CAF
thread.title_full: Hayatou kidney issue won't affect FIFA presidential job, says CAF

title: Hayatou kidney issue won't affect FIFA presidential job, says CAF
text:
Sports News | 13 October 2015 03:55 CET Hayatou kidney issue won't affect FIFA presidential job, says CAF - www.ghanasoccernet.com Issa Hayatou and Sepp Blatter 
The Confederation of African Football says Issa Hayatouâ€™s kidney illness will not prevent him from carrying out his full duties as acting FIFA president. 
The Cameroonian has been temporarily in charge of world soccer since Sepp Blatter was suspended for 90 days on Thursday as a result of being placed under criminal investigation by Swiss authorities. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
